quote: To be truly visonary, we have to root our imagination in our concrete experiences.

quote: If you find a book you really want to read but it hasn't been written yet, then you must write it.

quote: She turned to the sunlight And shook her yellow head, And whispered to her neighbor: Winter is dead.
Be the reason someone smiles today.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: red onions make my nose burn, so I wear goggles
author: Alex Forest
